sensortoolkit._format.format_names.Format_Param_Name¶

Format_Param_Name(param)[source]¶

Return formatted version of parameter column for plot, axis titles.

Parameters

param (str) – The evaluation parameter.

Returns

A formatted expression for the evaluation parameter. fmt_param_units (str):

A formatted expression for the evaluation parameter’s units.

Return type

fmt_param (str)

sensortoolkit
